member.summary: Protocol of the data exchange between the Dispatcher and Elevators

member.summary: Content is an object of type State

member.summary: Content is an object of type Order

member.name: F:Elev.Formats.Datagram.MsgType.Served
member.summary: Content is Order (floor that has been served)

member.summary: Content is order

member.summary: Type of the message to be sent

member.summary: Message content

member.name: M:Elev.Formats.Datagram.CreateOrder(Elev.Formats.Order)
member.summary: Order to be sent from an elevator when registered, and from the dispatcher to notify all elevators

member.summary: Status update to be sent from an elevator to the dispatcher

member.name: M:Elev.Formats.Datagram.CreateServed(Elev.Formats.Order)
member.summary: Order served message to be sent from either side in order to synchronize floor button lights and order queues
member.param: Floor that has now been served

member.name: M:Elev.Formats.Datagram.CreateToServe(Elev.Formats.Order)
member.summary: Sent from dispatcher to elevator when an order is assigned to this elevator
member.param: Order to be served by an elevator

member.summary: The tcp stream we are writing to

member.summary: Sends a message to the tcp stream

member.summary: Extracts first xml-object from the tcp stream, blocks

member.name: T:Elev.Formats.LogWriter
member.summary: Maintains a binary log file

member.summary: Creates a log writer that writes to a file with the given name

member.summary: Creates a log writer that writes to a file with the default name

member.name: M:Elev.Formats.LogWriter.WriteToLog(Elev.Formats.Order[])
member.summary: Appends one or more Order objects to the log file. Creates new log if the log file does not exist
member.param: Data to be written into the log file

member.summary: Erases and rewrites the whole log file

member.summary: Read the whole log to an array of Orders
